name: getteamroster
description:
This is a sub-function API for tool nhl_stats_and_live_data.
Tool description: Get live data and stats about any NHL game, teams, players, drafts and many more.

API description: Retrieves the roster of a hockey team for a given season using the RapidAPI NHL Stats and Live Data API.

is_id.description: The ID of the team for which to retrieve the roster.

season.description: The season for which to retrieve the roster. Defaults to 20172018.
